statements: DELETE FROM research_data WHERE id = 101 AND source = 'Journal A';
DELETE FROM research_data WHERE data_date < '2022-05-01' AND source LIKE 'Journal%';
DELETE FROM DatasetCleaning WHERE dataset_name = 'example_dataset' AND data_source = 'external_source';
DELETE FROM DataCleaning WHERE cleaning_status = TRUE;
DELETE FROM Preprocessing WHERE dataset_id = 100 AND processing_status = FALSE;
DELETE FROM Researchers WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Researchers WHERE researcher_id = 100 AND institution = 'University A';
DELETE FROM StatisticalAnalysis WHERE technique = 'Regression' AND analysis_id = 500;
